text: bhūmiyil teāṭṭuteāṭṭu kiṭakkunna khaṇḍaṅṅaḷuṇṭ‌. muntirittēāṭṭaṅṅaḷuṁ kr̥ṣikaḷuṁ, oru muraṭṭil ninn pala śākhaṅṅaḷāyi vaḷarunnatuṁ, vēṟe vēṟe muraṭukaḷil ninn vaḷarunnatumāya īntappanakaḷuṁ uṇṭ‌. orē veḷḷaṁ keāṇṭāṇ at nanaykkappeṭunnat‌. phalaṅṅaḷuṭe kāryattil avayil cilatine maṟṟu cilatinekkāḷ nāṁ meccappeṭuttunnu. tīrccayāyuṁ atil cintikkunna janaṅṅaḷkk dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷuṇṭ‌
